ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions for color-based visualization of multivariate data, i.e. colorgrams or heatmaps.  Lower-level functions  map numeric values to colors, display a matrix as an array of colors, and draw color keys.  Higher-level plotting functions generate a bivariate histogram, a dendrogram aligned with a color-coded matrix, a triangular distance matrix, and more.

Functions for color-based visualization of multivariate data, i.e. colorgrams or heatmaps.  Lower-level functions  map numeric values to colors, display a matrix as an array of colors, and draw color keys.  Higher-level plotting functions generate a bivariate histogram, a dendrogram aligned with a color-coded matrix, a triangular distance matrix, and more.

name: r-squash
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.9" %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-squash
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: squash_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/squash_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/squash/squash_{{ version }}.tar.gz

  sha256: ff381c85071e3407574e3db28d789657f64e7d3f9d74ac123539de22ab8ac6f4

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 5

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('squash')"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('squash')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/squash/index.html
  license: Artistic-2.0
  summary: Functions for color-based visualization of multivariate data, i.e. colorgrams or heatmaps.  Lower-level functions  map numeric values to colors, display a matrix as an array of colors, and draw color keys.  Higher-level plotting functions generate a bivariate histogram, a dendrogram aligned with a color-coded
    matrix, a triangular distance matrix, and more.
  license_family: OTHER
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/Artistic-2.0
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
